MeasurementToolMetadata.Instructions: The following statements are things that people in your neighborhood may or may not do. For each of these statements, choose whether you strongly agree, agree, neither agree nor disagree, disagree or strongly disagree.

ncc_01.Description: My neighborhood is a close-knit neighborhood.

ncc_02.Description: People in my neighborhood are willing to help their neighbors

ncc_03.Description: People in my neighborhood generally don't get along with each other.

ncc_04.Description: People in my neighborhood do not share the same values.

ncc_05.Description: People in my neighborhood can be trusted.
